title: Bosses
content: Bosses in Baldur's Gate 3 features a lineup of a special, unique, and powerful type of enemy. Bosses are encountered throughout the game, they have increased health, a unique set of attacks, its own behavior, and stats. Usually, bosses are encountered at the end of a chapter of the main campaign, or encountered in various locations or areas that require to be defeated in order to proceed further or to unlock more areas.
